name: Starweaver - Global Gam Jam 2020
description:
This is  Starweaver!

The stars are falling and your camp is in disarray. Return the stars to the night sky using the power of your magical paintbrush, and use their energy to repair your friends' items.

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2020, a 48 hour game jam and we participated on site at the University of Suffolk.

Starweaver was made by:

Alex Turnbull - Team Lead | Programmer - @_alexturnbull

Jayden Murray - VFX Artist | Designer - @_JaydenMurray

Sean Turner - Artist | Designer - @seanturnerGD

Katie Millar - Composer | Artist | Designer - @sparrowdust_dev

Contact:

You can visit us at  http://monkeyhat.games/ .
